title: Under Twin Suns
description: Ketorai (Ket) has an unusual psychic gift. Because of it, she's been outcast from her home, kidnapped, and the subject of cruel experiments. She's had her angle broken. She's been threatened, and framed for a horrendous crime. Now, she's just seen her childhood sweetheart killed. She's had enough.
author: Wendy L. Koenig
